user_query: My family and I are considering investing in the stock market and we want to gather information about the stock prices of various companies. Fetch us the stock prices of TCS.NS, AAPL, and GOOGL. Furthermore, we would like to know the current monthly inflation rate. Kindly provide us with the details. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Fetch stock prices for TCS.NS, AAPL, and GOOGL.
Fetch the current monthly inflation rate.
